title: ICE with packed union: "alignment mismatch between ABI and layout"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Found with a [modified fuzz-rustc](https://github.com/jruderman/fuzz-rustc) ### Code ```Rust #[repr(packed(1))] union U { x: u32, } const B: U = U { x: 0 }; fn main() {} ``` ### Error output with debug assertions enabled alignment mismatch between ABI and layout in TyAndLayout { ... }, [compiler/rustc_ty_utils/src/layout_sanity_check.rs:77](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/604d52108e9272d75618ab6a7b5eb006857fce52/compiler/rustc_ty_utils/src/layout_sanity_check.rs#L77)
Full output including backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `Align(1 bytes)`, right: `Align(4 bytes)`: alignment mismatch between ABI and layout in TyAndLayout { ty: U, layout: Layout { size: Size(4 bytes), align: AbiAndPrefAlign { abi: Align(1 bytes), pref: Align(1 bytes), }, abi: Scalar( Union { value: Int( I32, false, ), }, ), fields: Union( 1, ), largest_niche: None, variants: Single { index: 0, }, }, }', compiler/rustc_ty_utils/src/layout_sanity_check.rs:77:21 stack backtrace: 0: 0x10f448f21 - ::fmt::hcf5aac4d53eab431 1: 0x10f506818 - core::fmt::write::hed31846cddb4e13c 2: 0x10f4abec8 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h01887004f97cedc7 3: 0x10f448d12 - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h2141c6543b5865e5 4: 0x10f4ace45 - ### Version Built stage1 from 604d52108e9272d75618ab6a7b5eb006857fce52 on x86_64-apple-darwin
config.toml ```toml # Includes one of the default files in src/bootstrap/defaults profile = "compiler" changelog-seen = 2 [llvm] download-ci-llvm = true # Download a pre-built LLVM? assertions = true # LLVM assertions on? [rust] incremental = true # Build rustc with incremental compilation? debug-assertions = true overflow-checks = true ```
CC #99836 participants: @cuviper, @RalfJung @eddyb @rustbot label +A-layout
